text: avaṉtāṉ uṅkaḷai pūmiyil muṉ ceṉṟavarkaḷiṉ iṭattil vaittāṉ. Uṅkaḷil cilarai maṟṟavarkaḷaiviṭa antastil uyarttiyum irukkiṟāṉ. (Itaṉ mūlam) uṅkaḷukkuk koṭuttavaṟṟil (nīṅkaḷ evvāṟu naṭantu koḷkiṟīrkaḷ eṉṟu) uṅkaḷaic cōtikkiṟāṉ. Niccayamāka umatu iṟaivaṉ taṇṭippatil mikat tīviramāṉavaṉ. Āyiṉum, niccayamāka avaṉ mikka piḻai poṟuppavaṉ, perum karuṇaiyuṭaiyavaṉ āvāṉ
